pages.index: Welcome to TeaCoffee - Discover the Perfect Blend of Tea and Coffee. About History Reviews Order +91-151-9719649 teacoffee@gmail.com Try the best flavors Indulge in the rich aromas and exquisite flavors of TeaCoffee. connect with us Crafting Moments, Sharing Passions At TeaCoffee, our passion for the perfect brew is matched only by our dedication to sharing it with the world. Since our inception, we've been committed to curating a selection of the finest teas and coffees from across the globe. But beyond our products, we strive to create a community of enthusiasts united by a love for exceptional flavors and rich traditions. Whether you're exploring the nuances of a delicate green tea or savoring the robust notes of a dark roast coffee, we invite you to join us on a journey of discovery and delight. Our Roots TeaCoffee began its journey with a simple yet profound vision: to bring the world of exceptional teas and coffees closer to enthusiasts everywhere. Founded in 2017, our company embarked on a mission to source the finest quality ingredients, meticulously craft blends, and foster a community centered around the joy of brewing and sharing. From our humble beginnings to our present-day offerings, every step of our evolution has been guided by a commitment to excellence and a passion for the perfect cup. Our Commitment Over the years, TeaCoffee has remained steadfast in its dedication to quality, sustainability, and innovation. We've forged partnerships with farmers and producers who share our values, ensuring that every batch of tea and coffee meets our rigorous standards. From implementing eco-friendly packaging to supporting fair trade practices, we're continuously striving to make a positive impact on the world around us. As we look towards the future, our commitment to excellence remains unwavering, driving us to explore new horizons and enrich the lives of our customers. Our Advantages Craftsmanship At TeaCoffee, we take pride in our craftsmanship. Each blend is carefully curated and expertly roasted or brewed to perfection. From the selection of premium tea leaves and coffee beans to the meticulous blending process, our commitment to quality ensures a consistently exceptional taste in every cup. Variety With a diverse range of flavors and blends, we cater to every taste and preference. Whether you prefer the bold richness of a dark roast coffee or the delicate complexity of a green tea, our extensive selection ensures there's something for everyone to enjoy. Sustainability We are committed to sustainability at every step of our production process. From ethically sourcing our ingredients to implementing eco-friendly packaging, we strive to minimize our environmental impact while delivering the highest quality products to our customers. Discover the World of Tea and Coffee The Art of Brewing Embark on a sensory journey as you explore the art of brewing with TeaCoffee. From the delicate floral notes of a white tea to the bold richness of an espresso, each cup tells a story of craftsmanship and tradition. Exploring Flavors Dive into a world of flavor with TeaCoffee's diverse range of teas and coffees sourced from around the globe. From the earthy tones of a Pu-erh tea to the fruity acidity of a Kenyan coffee, there's a taste sensation waiting to be discovered. Customer Reviews John Smith "TeaCoffee's selection of teas and coffees is truly exceptional. As a coffee enthusiast, I was delighted by the richness and complexity of their espresso blends. Their attention to detail in sourcing and roasting is evident in every sip." Michael Johnson "I recently discovered TeaCoffee and I'm impressed by the variety of teas they offer. Their herbal teas are particularly soothing and flavorful. It's become a part of my daily routine to enjoy a cup of their chamomile tea before bed." David Williams "I've been a loyal customer of TeaCoffee for years now and I can't recommend them enough. Their commitment to quality and sustainability sets them apart. Plus, their customer service is always top-notch." Christopher Brown "I had the pleasure of trying TeaCoffee's cold brew coffee and it was absolutely refreshing. It's perfect for hot summer days. I appreciate their dedication to creating innovative and delicious beverages." Contact us I accept Privacy policy Privacy policy Terms of use Taste in every cup
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy | TeaCoffee About History Reviews Order +91-151-9719649 teacoffee@gmail.com Privacy Policy On our website, we value and protect your privacy. We strive to ensure the security of your personal data and comply with all applicable privacy laws. Collection and Use of Information We do not collect or store any personal user data, except for email addresses voluntarily provided when contacting us regarding our services. We use the provided email addresses solely to respond to user inquiries and do not disclose them to third parties without your consent. Data Security We make every effort to secure your information. However, we cannot guarantee absolute protection of your data over the internet, so we recommend exercising caution when transmitting confidential information online. Third-party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites not operated by us. We are not responsible for the content or privacy policies of these sites and recommend reviewing their privacy policies when visiting them. Changes to the Privacy Policy We reserve the right to make changes to our privacy policy. Any changes will be posted on this page. We recommend periodically checking this page for updates. Contact Us If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our privacy policy, please contact us at the following email address: teacoffee@gmail.com. Privacy policy Terms of use Taste in every cup
pages.terms: Terms of Service | TeaCoffee About History Reviews Order +91-151-9719649 teacoffee@gmail.com Terms of Agreement We urge you to carefully read these terms and conditions before engaging with our services. Clarifications and Definitions Clarifications The capitalized terms used herein are defined under certain conditions and shall maintain their assigned meanings, whether used in the singular or plural form. Definitions Affiliate: Refers to any entity that exercises control over, is controlled by, or is commonly controlled with a party, where "control" encompasses owning 50% or more of the voting rights, equity, or other securities influencing management election. Device: Encompasses any mechanism allowing access to the service, including but not limited to computers, smartphones, and tablets. Service: This term is used in reference to the website provided by the Company. You: Identifies any individual or entity using or accessing the service, personally or on behalf of another legal entity. Acknowledgment These terms and conditions form the basis of the agreement between you and the company, delineating the legal rights and obligations of all parties concerning the use of the service. Your use of the service is conditioned upon your acceptance and adherence to these terms. They are applicable to all users, visitors, and others accessing or using the service. By engaging with the service, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you find any part of these terms unacceptable, it is advised not to use the service. You affirm that you are at least 18 years old. The company explicitly prohibits the use of the service by individuals under 18 years of age. Your use of the service is also conditioned upon your acceptance of the company's privacy policy, which should be carefully reviewed before engagement. External Links Our service may feature links to external sites or services not operated by us. These links are provided for convenience and do not signify endorsement. We do not take responsibility for the content, policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services. It is your responsibility to review the privacy policies and terms of any sites you visit. Service Termination We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any breach of these terms. If your right to use the service is terminated, it shall cease immediately. Limitations of Liability In no event shall the company or its suppliers be liable for any incidental, indirect, special, punitive, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the service, whether such damages are foreseeable. The aggregate liability of the company and its suppliers under these terms is limited to the greater of the amount you paid to the company for access and use of the service, or 100 USD if no purchase was made through the service. Service "AS IS" Provision The service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis, with no warranties of any kind, express or implied. The company disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. The company does not warrant that the service will function uninterrupted, be secure, or be available at any particular time or location. Applicable Law The laws of the country, excluding its conflict of law rules, govern these terms and your use of the service. Your use of the application may also subject you to other local, state, national, or international laws. Dispute Resolution If you have disputes or concerns regarding the service, we encourage you to contact the company directly to seek resolution. Severability & Waiver Severability If any provision of these terms is deemed unenforceable or invalid, such provision shall be modified to achieve the original intent as closely as possible, and the remaining provisions shall remain in effect. Waiver Failure to enforce any right or provision of these terms shall not be considered a waiver of those rights. Modification of Terms We reserve the right to modify these terms at our discretion. You will be notified of any significant changes in advance, and by continuing to use the service, you accept the revised terms. Privacy policy Terms of use Taste in every cup
